channel.title: CVE Feed for Hallo Welt! GmbH -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-42431|2023-10-30T10:50:52.614Z -- hallo%20welt%21%20gmbh -- bluespice
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in BlueSpiceAvatars extension of BlueSpice allows logged in user to inject arbitrary HTML into the profile image dialog on Special:Preferences. This only applies to the genuine user context.
